actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to establish teacher recruitment and professional development programs for rural areas, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to authorize the Secretary of Education, under title II (Dwight D. Eisenhower Professional Development Program) part A (Federal Activities), to award competitive grants to rural eligible local educational agencies to develop incentive programs to: (1) recruit and retain qualified teachers; and (2) provide high-quality professional development to teachers.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to establish teacher recruitment and professional development programs for rural areas, and for other purposes.
